Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the use of accrued vacation time
Summary: Allows New York state employees to use accrued vacation time toward student loan payments; defines terms; requires the president of the civil service commission to promulgate necessary rules and regulations.
LawCode: Add ยง159-e, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to use of accrued vacation time
